title: Only the old 2011 real estate assessments are  posted on the county web site.  Why are the new 2012 reassessments not posted?  When will they be posted?  This makes it impossible to determine if the assessed 2012 value is consistent with the values of similar properties.
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=12301
